attributes.action: Reduce Council Tax Rates for Local Authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more people are being made redundant. Reduce the council tax to alleviate the financial burden on lower income households and students.

rejection.details: Council tax rates are set by the administrations of individual local authorities and will vary from one council to another. They are not set by central Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
